thread.title: Trail Blazers fans get a look at the team in a free show at the Moda Center (Photos & Video)
thread.title_full: Trail Blazers fans get a look at the team in a free show at the Moda Center (Photos & Video) | OregonLive.com

author: Randy L. Rasmussen | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Trail Blazers fans get a look at the team in a free show at the Moda Center (Photos & Video)
text:
Fans got a chance to watch the 2015-16 Portland Trail Blazers in action as the Blazers opened their doors free in their 11th annual Fan Fest on Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015 at the Moda Center.
Youth Teams Take The Court At Trail Blazers Fan Fest Youth basketball teams go to take the court before the Portland Trail Blazers played an intra-squad scrimmage at the Moda Center,
In an intra-squad scrimmage, the White team, lead by CJ McCollum with 12 points, beat the Black team, lead by Damian Lillard with 9 points.
Fans selected Damian Lillard as the MVP of the night's play.
--Randy L. Rasmussen
